description.value:
Can extend up to 1.5m from shoulder or back mounting. Has Fixed Strength Characteristic of 75 and Unnatural Strength(7) Trait, uses this value regardless of Character's strength or talents. No Fine Manipulation, but can lift or tether objects as a Free Action. Has Melee Profile (2d10+14 I, Pen 10, Unwieldy)

Requirements

Best Craftmanship: 85 Strength, +1 Damage. Requires Mechadendrite Use (Utility) to use and Mechadendrite Use(Weapon) to attack

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
